diffDate
diffDate
. Calculate date
Purpose:
period calculation by subtracting dates.
It is used to filter objects.
Syntax:
Parameters:
Define in which units the subtraction is performed. Select the units of the subtracted period from the drop-down list;
Argument 1 – the date the next value is subtracted from
Argument 2 – the date that is subtracted from the previous value
Dates can be specified as an attribute, variable (within the algorithm), function, reference value.
Use case.
The following filtering is used to display requests that have been created in the last 4 days in the registry:
